returns._0: (whether there is a setter (address(0 if not)), Position 0: Royalty setter is set in the registry 1: ERC2981 and no setter 2: setter can be set using owner() 3: setter can be set using admin() 4: setter cannot be set, nor support for ERC2981

params._royaltyFeeRegistry: address of the royalty fee registry

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateOwnerOfRoyaltyFeeRegistry(address).details: Can be used for migration of this royalty fee setter contract

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollection(address,a.details: Can only be called by contract owner (of this)

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollectionIfAdmin(ad.details: Only to be called if there is no setter address

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollectionIfOwner(ad.details: Only to be called if there is no setter address

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollectionIfSetter(a.details: Only to be called if there msg.sender is the setter

updateOwnerOfRoyaltyFeeRegistry(address).notice: Update owner of royalty fee registry

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollectionIfAdmin(ad.notice: Update royalty info for collection if admin

updateRoyaltyInfoForCollectionIfOwner(ad.notice: Update royalty info for collection if owner

userdoc.notice: Used to allow creators to set royalty parameters in the RoyaltyFeeRegistry.
